Package net.datacrow.core.clients

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBackupRestoreClient
    A backup listener will be updated on events and errors during the backup process.
    IClient
    A generic Data Crow process client.
    IFileImportClient
    This client can be updated on events and results form a file import process.
    IItemExporterClient
    A client for Item Export processes
    IItemImporterClient
    A client for Item Import processes
    IModuleWizardClient
    A client for Item Export processes
    ISynchronizerClient
    A client for item synchronizer processes.
